headline: Macquarie Infrastructure Partners VI Exercises Option to Increase Equity Stake in Diamond Infrastructure Solutions to 49%
summary: NEW YORK, September 02, 2025--Macquarie Asset Management today announced that Macquarie Infrastructure Partners VI ("MIP VI"), an unlisted infrastructure fund managed by Macquarie Asset Management has exercised the previously announced option to acquire an additional 9% equity stake in select U.S. Gulf Coast infrastructure assets of Dow Inc. ("Dow") (NYSE: DOW). This brings MIP VI’s total equity stake in Diamond Infrastructure Solutions ("Diamond") to 49%.

raw.headline: Macquarie Infrastructure Partners VI Exercises Option to Increase Equity Stake in Diamond Infrastructure Solutions to 49%
raw.summary: NEW YORK, September 02, 2025--Macquarie Asset Management today announced that Macquarie Infrastructure Partners VI ("MIP VI"), an unlisted infrastructure fund managed by Macquarie Asset Management has exercised the previously announced option to acquire an additional 9% equity stake in select U.S. Gulf Coast infrastructure assets of Dow Inc. ("Dow") (NYSE: DOW). This brings MIP VI’s total equity stake in Diamond Infrastructure Solutions ("Diamond") to 49%.

headline: Macquarie Asset Management expands equity stake in Diamond Infrastructure Solutions, a strategic partnership with Dow
summary: Dow (NYSE: DOW) today announced it has received an additional $540 million in proceeds following Macquarie Asset Management's increased investment in Diamond Infrastructure Solutions (Diamond), raising its minority equity stake from 40% to 49%. This brings Dow's total proceeds from the transaction to approximately $3 billion.
